original_text: I answered them that it was not the custom of the Romans to give up anyone before the accused met the accusers face to face and had opportunity to make his defense concerning the charge laid against him.
korean_text: 내가 대답하되 무릇 피고가 원고들 앞에서 고소 사건에 대하여 변명할 기회가 있기 전에 내주는 것은 로마 사람의 법이 아니라 하였노라

sentences.original_text: that it was not the custom of the Romans
before the accused met the accusers face to face
and had opportunity to make his defense
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신을 변호할 기회를 갖기 전에는

sentences.original_text: concerning the charge laid against him.
